title: Tata Motors sees a relatively weak H1, set to shed net automotive debt though in FY25
description: Tata Motors anticipates achieving net automotive debt-free status in FY25 following record revenue, profits, and free cash flows. Its Indian business is debt-free. Despite caution regarding domestic demand in the first half, Tata Motors said it remains optimistic, particularly about the premium luxury segment, aiming for a robust performance in FY25.
